transcript:
Customer: Appu second sir ma yaar.
Halo?
Halo? Halo?
Customer: Madam sollunga madam.
Executive: India Mart catalog team call pannirukom sir.
Customer: Madam sollunga madam.
Executive: Enna sir actually lead issue endra maari mail pannirukinga.
Customer: Aama madam.
Executive: Call vandhu catalog team ku forward pannirukanga. Actually namma catalog vandhu lead la varudhu allocate aagudhu. Enna namma profile ku varadhu illaiya sir?
Customer: Aama madam namakku pathina onnu rendu andha maari dhaan varudhu. Avanga enna reason sonnanga adha sollunga. Naa neraiya per kitta indha complaint sollita vandhen.
Executive: Statues la pannringa illingala?
Customer: Aamaa wooden statue pannrom wooden wall bracket pannrom adhu mattum wooden carved wall bracket adhu mattum dhaan pannrom.
Executive: Wooden idhu pannringa.
Customer: Aama madam.
Executive: Wooden wall hanging vandhirukudhu adhu kapuram vandhirukke sir namma lead eduthurukingala namma profile la?
Customer: Enna madam thedhingana thedi kandu pudichikittu sollala adhanala related aa chinna chinna wood related aa vitturunga madam. Naa adha dhaan sonnen metal, brass, fiber, COP, stone idhula varakudadhu sollita madam.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Adhula mukkiyama varakudadhu enakku. Enakku wooden statue mattum kudunga madam.
Executive: Seri idhu India Mart first one pathingana full and full systematic process okingala. Neenga buyer consume panna consume panna dhaan system aa judge pannittu ungalukku allocate panna for example innaikku pathu varudhu adhula rendu dhaan innaikku namakku relevant aa varudhu naakooda andha rendume wood and statue neenga edukkiringana naalaki pathu lead allocate aagumbodhu adhula four to five lead namakku relevant aa varum. So next day next day neenga continue pannumbodhu system judge panna ok indha company vandhu wooden statue pannranga adhula jaasti achu maximum pannranganu sollittu judge pannittu adhukku etha maari leads allocate panni kodukkrom. Namma initially adha vandhu namma check pannamayo illa namma poi filter panni paakalam. Filter panniyum paakama namma normal aa varradhu ellame ipo adhu relevant illa illa indha maari complaint vandhu namma raise pannitte irundhomna namakku system vandhu leads allocation la work pannadhu.
Customer: Madam indha complaint vandhu rendu ara varushamaa naa sollittu irukken rendu ara varushamaa naa business pannittu irukken India Mart la rendu varushamaa indha business naa irunootu ambadhu time complaint panniruppen eppadi naa pesiye neenga thirumbi mudhal la irundhu start pannadhinga madam neenga.
Executive: Seri trade.indiamart.com try pannirukangala neenga use pannirukingala?
Customer: Adhu try panni paarthen madam adhaiyum try panni paarthen.
Executive: Adhula lead vandhadhingala ungalukku?
Customer: Varudhu madam appakappa mattum paakradha irukku adhu paakka mudiyala enakku.
Executive: Yenna once adhula vandhu namma check panni paakalam yenna ipo lead illa appidina naanga head office mail panni vaanguvom aanaa ungalukku lead allocate aagudhu but namma profile la allocate aagala na adhu enna reason nu solli namma check panni paakalam adhukaga dhaan kekkaren.
Customer: Neenga endha team la irundhu call pannirukinga?
Executive: Catalog catalog updation kaaga.
Customer: Catalog updation ok. Lead varala nu solli irundhanga so adhu dhaan enna issue endradhu identify pannradhukaga call pannirukkom. Adhu dhaan ipo naa naalaki meeting link vandhu naa ungalukku send pannren meeting aave namma connect pannikalam. Enna problem nu sollittu live aave update pannalam. Second one vandhu pathingana ennadhu full aa wood statue pannringa illingala?
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Idhula category eppadi map pannunom trade bar la eppadi use pannunom endradhu naa overall ungalukku guidance tharen.
Customer: Madam already idhellam first eh illa illa idhellam already full aa nalla teach pannittanga adhellam neenga starting la irundhu ipo vare kekkiringa ipo.
Executive: Just adhu check pannalam.
Customer: Madam naa edge la vandhu nikkaren naa ipo vandhu edge la vandhu nikkaren neenga thirumbi starting la irundhu aarambikkiringa neenga.
Executive: Sir starting la irundhe illa ipo.
Customer: Madam neenga endha meeting neenga edukka venda naa solradhu mattum neenga seiyinga podhum avlodhaan. Metal, fiber, brass, COP, polyresin, stone idhellam varama aakkunga catalog team dhaan neenga.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Idhu varakudadhu madam mudhal la idha pannunga neenga endha meeting panna venda summa per vachikittu meeting pannirukinga adhu thirumbi vandhuttu dhaan irukku. Ipo sonnadha sari pannunga neenga.
Executive: Ipo connect pannradhuna neenga endha lead eduthurukinga endha location la irundhu eduthurukinga.
Customer: Madam ipo solli irundha indha prachana indha madam indha catalog la indha prachana mudhal la solve pannunga adhu kapuram naa paathukkaren madam adhu kapuram paakalam neenga meeting la irundhu ponga.
Executive: India Mart la dhaan pannringa illa pan India mattum pannringa illingala?
Customer: Pan India pannren madam naa.
Executive: Pan India pannringa appo problem illaiye sir indha maari varudhu naa adha skip pannittu neenga venum endradha eduthinganale ungalukku automatic aa allocate aaga aarambichidum.
Customer: Madam ennodadhu catalog pathingala naa evlo idhu feedback koduthiruppen metal naa steel brass metal evlo feedback koduthiruppen adhellam neenga read panni paathingala adhu ethana nala ethana maasamaa adhu naa feedback aa ungalukku koduthirukken adhu neenga eduthu read panni paathingala appuram eppadi neenga thirumbi madam adhu dhaan neenga full aa go through panni paarunga ennodadhu adhu kapuram neenga enta kelunga ellame.
Executive: Sir naa check panni paarthen adhula ungalukku every month direct enquiry calls ume varudhu illa adhu ellame relevant aa dhaan varum ungalukku.
Customer: Mudhal la enna prachana irukku sollu.
Executive: Illa illa client call pannrangana wood statue vo wood handicraft vo naa Google la search panni adhukku dhaan ungaloda company ku naa call panniruppen. Seri wood ku aanu call pannirukken call or message vandhu solid aa every month ungalukku pathu to padhinanju call varudhu message vandhu above sixty varudhu aruvadhu plus message varudhu adhu ellame ungalukku relevant aa dhaan irukke.
Customer: Koduthu comment irrrelevant aa koduthurukken madam neraiya theva illadha idhellam enquiry ellam varudhu appidinnu.
Executive: Adhukku dhaan naa koduthurukken.
Executive: Naa solla la ungalukku India Mart la three type of business provide pannrom direct calls direct message moonavadhu dhaan buylead neenga solradhu adhu dhaan thirty four aanaa ungalukku direct message mattume aruvadhu plus message varudhu oru maasathukku call mattume pathukku padhinanju call solid aa varudhu adhu ellame vandhu buyer vandhu ipo adhu eppadi ungalukku run aagumnu naa vandhu wooden elephant search pannrena Google open panni India Mart open panni adhula wooden elephant wood work ku naa message pannrena unga profile photo paathuttu dhaan naa call pannren photo size details ellam check pannittu adhu namma profile paathuttu namakke varradhu ipo aruvadhu message varudhu padhinanju call varudhu appidina adhu namakku relevant dhaan aanaa adhu ungalukku useful aa dhaan irukudhu.
Customer: Ok namma lead manager solldringala adhu naa andha idhula varala naa solldringala.
Executive: Lead manager la varradhu direct messages calls endradhu unga number ku varradhu.
Customer: Ok buylead consume pannradhu adhu ennadhu?
Executive: Buylead endradhu adhu vandhu oru third buylead endradhu enna appidina ipo naa ungala maari endha seller um approach pannama naa India Mart requirement post pannuven indha maari wood elephant deal pannravangala enakku suggest pannunga nu sollittu direct message call endradhu ungalukku mattum dhaan varum but lead manager naa miss pannradhe kidaiyaadhu naa.
Executive: Aruvadhaana enna lead vera indha lead vera neenga confuse panna irukka kudadhu endradhukaga dhaan kekkaren adhu dhaan irukkadhaan irukkum.
Customer: Illa adhu ok overall adhellam relevant aa irukku lead manager la maximum enakku relevant aa dhaan irukku adhula onnum mistake illa.
Executive: Profile paathuttu ungalukke call pannradhu dhaan appo neenga enna product pannringalo adhu keyword kodukkumbodhu dhaan namma company varudhu ok appo adhu relevant aa dhaan irukkum idhu edhukaga naa meeting kekkaren appidina sila profile vandhu engalukku open aagaadhu oru sila idhu ungala engalaala open panni paakka mudiyadhu for example lead manager paakka mudiyadhu catalog la remapping panna mudiyadhu numbers change email change sila access ume engalukku available aa irukkaadhu neenga join pannumbodhu neenga screen aa visible pannringa appidina adhukku dhaan monthly once vandhu naanga meeting connect panna solluvom enna issues irukku endradha identify pannittu naanga check pannuvom neenga ipo buylead vandhu system allocate panni kodukkudhu naa naa sonna maari innaikku lead available illaiya ungalukku thevaiyana lead negative aa irundhaa adha skip pannirunga poi not relevant not relevant not relevant mark panninga naa system naala judge panna mudiyadhu ungalukku positive aa ungalukku thevaiyana lead eduthu kodukkanumaa illa lead aa poi block pannumanu theriyadhu appo adhu irrrelevant aa judge pannradhunaala ungalukku indha maari leads allocation kammi aagum neenga first oru one week namma catalog vandhu analyse pannalam naalaki namma meeting connect pannikalam oru ten to fifteen minutes mattum join pannunga naa issues ellam irukkuradha naa mudinja alavukku naa clear pannidren adhu kapuramaa namma oru one week vandhu naa trade.indiamart.com guide pannren mobile la enna update pannunga okingala adhu concern naa ipo close pannittu naa ungalukku update pannren second one naalaki adha vandhu oru one week analyse panni paakalam edhunaala yenna oru pathu to padhinanju naal namma observation la vachu analyse pannadhaan namakku theriyum edhunaala lead indha maari varudhu onnu illa neenga concern close panna illa adhu neenga close pannadhinga naalaki namma paappom naanga sonnadhellam ok catalog vandhu update panna mudiyadhu enakku andha chance open aagaadhu aamaa ennodadhu ennodadhu number neenga whatsapp number sollunga naa ungalukku whatsapp la text pannren idhu dhaan ennodadhu number ennodadhu name sujitha seri ok madam number sollunga neenga concern close pannittingana aduthu enna irukkuradhu appuram response illaama irukkum.
Executive: Concern raise pannradhellam oru issue ve kidaiyaadhu adhu mobile laiye eppadi raise pannunumnu naa naalaki ungalukku guide pannren concern raise pannradhukaga illa ungaloda issue clear aaganum lead varala naa adhu namma vandhu business kaaga pay pannirukkom adhu eppadi varanumnu adha varavaikkalam endradhukaga namma work pannunom correct aa irukkingala neenga number sollunga whatsapp number la irundhu naa text pannren number whatsapp number sollunga 9500 9500 217 217 950 madam.
Executive: 950 naa ipo text pannittu indha number kooda save pannikkonga ungaloda account manager number ume ungalukku adhula available aa irukkum edhukku meeting naa actually sonnadhe solradhukaga illa sir enna issue endradha monthly once namma seller execute panni adha identify pannunom neenga ippadi kodukradhunaala lead varalaiyaa illa endha side la irundhu ungalukku allocate aagalaiyaa seri irukkiyaa enna update pannalam endradha chinna chinna issues namma identify panni adha analyse panni namma change pannadhaan undu appidi paathingana eppave clear aayirukku naa sonna prachana ellam eppave clear aayirukkume monthly monthly meeting pannranga naa dhaan indha prachana sollren appidi paathingana eppave clear aayirukkume enakku aanaa neenga naalaki panna mattum pannunga illa unga catalog naa paarthen direct message varudhu paathingala ungalukku call o messages o varama irundha dhaan issue aanaa ungalukku direct calls messages nallave varudhu aruvadhu message oru pathu padhinanju call varudhu naa namma catalog vandhu healthy aana catalog nallave promote aagudhu but buylead la issue naa enna reason naa namma not relevant mark pannitte irukkom namma leads vandhu koduthukitte irukkom and this indha maari concern raise pannitte irundhinga appidina ungalukku buyleads allocation aagaadhu Google la promote aagradhunaala ungalukku direct messages calls varalaam but India Mart la irundhu buylead irundhaalume namma profile allocate aagradhu late aagum idhu dhaan issue actually issue.
Customer: Seri.
Executive: Naa idha close pannittu naalaki meeting naa number anuppi irukken whatsapp la anuppi irukken ennodadhu name sujitha naalaki enna timing neenga available?
Customer: After 11 naalaki oru 9:30 ku kooda available dhaan madam.
Executive: Naa unga actually 11 o clock mela available sir.
Customer: Appidiyaa ok neenga eppo available.
Executive: Seri ok adhu mela meeting vachiralam madam.
Executive: Seri ok naa ipo close pannren naa ipo pesunadhukana feedback varum ungalukku whatsapp la okingala.
Customer: Seri ok.
Executive: Adhuvume paathuttu konjam positive aa koduthurunga naa naalaki ungalukku catalog update panni tharen.
Executive: Ok sir thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing issues with irrelevant buyleads.

- Wants only wooden statues related buyleads.

- Dissatisfied with the quality of leads.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Executive offered a meeting to resolve issues.

- Executive offered guidance on trade features.

- Executive explained the lead allocation process.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled to discuss issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, irrelevant leads, meeting, trade features
